SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_User WHERE USER_NAME = #{user_name} AND PASS_WORD IS NULL

SELECT COUNT(IF(STAT_FLAG='01',STAT_FLAG,NULL)) as STAT_NEWW, /*신규*/ COUNT(IF(STAT_FLAG='02',STAT_FLAG,NULL)) as STAT_CHEK, /*접수*/ COUNT(IF(STAT_FLAG='03',STAT_FLAG,NULL)) as STAT_LOAD, /*진행*/ COUNT(IF(STAT_FLAG='04',STAT_FLAG,NULL)) as STAT_COMP /*완료*/ FROM HD_Board

SELECT TITL_NAME /*제목*/ FROM HD_Board WHERE 1=1
AND TITL_NAME LIKE #{search} '%'
ORDER BY CREA_DATE DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD_Comment WHERE IDXX_NUMB = #{idxx_numb}

SELECT IDXX_NUMB /*순번*/ , TITL_NAME /*제목*/ , USER_NAME /*이름*/ , CONT_ENTS /*내용*/ , STAT_FLAG /*상태*/ , SUCC_DATE /*완료일자*/ , CREA_USER /*생성자*/ , CREA_DATE /*생성일자*/ , UPDA_USER /*수정자*/ , UPDA_DATE /*수정일자*/ , CATE_GORY /*카테고리*/ ,( SELECT CODE_NAME /*카테고리 이름*/ FROM HD_Code WHERE CLAS_CODE = 'CATE_GORY' /*클래스 코드가 카테고리*/ AND COMM_CODE = CATE_GORY) /*글 카테고리 코드에 맞는 이름*/ AS CATE_NAME /*카테고리*/
FROM HD_Board WHERE IDXX_NUMB = #{idxx_numb}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HD_Board ( /* boardInsert 게시글 저장 [요청사항 저장]*/ IDXX_NUMB /*순번*/ , TITL_NAME /*이름*/ , USER_NAME /*이름*/ , CONT_ENTS /*내용*/ , SUCC_DATE /*완료일자*/ , STAT_FLAG /*상태*/ , CREA_USER /*생성자*/ , CREA_DATE /*생성일자*/ , UPDA_USER /*수정자*/ , UPDA_DATE /*수정일자*/ , CATE_GORY /*카테고리*/ ) VALUES( #{idxx_numb} /*순번*/ ,#{titl_name} /*제목*/ ,#{user_name} /*이름*/ ,#{cont_ents} /*내용*/ ,#{succ_date} /*완료일자*/ ,#{stat_flag} /*상태*/ ,#{crea_user} /*생성자*/ ,now() /*생성일자*/ ,#{upda_user} /*수정자*/ ,#{upda_date} /*수정일자*/ ,#{cate_gory} /*카테고리*/ )
mapper.update:

TITL_NAME = #{titl_name}, /*제목*/
CONT_ENTS = #{cont_ents}, /*내용*/
CATE_GORY = #{cate_gory},
UPDA_DATE = now() /*수정일자*/ WHERE IDXX_NUMB = #{idxx_numb}

UPDATE HD_Board SET STAT_FLAG = #{stat_flag} /*상태 플래그*/ , UPDA_DATE = now() /*수정일자*/
,SUCC_DATE = now()
,SUCC_DATE = null
WHERE IDXX_NUMB = #{idxx_numb}
mapper.select: SELECT CODE_NAME /*상태 이름*/ FROM HD_Code WHERE CLAS_CODE = 'STAT_FLAG' AND COMM_CODE = #{stat_flag}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HD_File ( /* fileInsert 파일업로드 정보 저장 [파일정보저장]*/ FILE_NUMB /*파일순번*/ , IDXX_NUMB /*게시글번호*/ , FILE_NAME /*파일명*/ , FILE_ORIG /*원본파일명*/ , FILE_URLL /*파일 절대 경로*/ ) VALUES ( #{file_numb} /*파일순번*/ , #{idxx_numb} /*게시글번호*/ , #{file_name} /*파일명*/ , #{file_orig} /*원본파일명*/ , #{file_urll} /*파일 절대 경로*/ )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NUMB /*파일순번*/ , IDXX_NUMB /*게시글번호*/ , FILE_NAME /*파일명*/ , FILE_ORIG /*원본파일명*/ , FILE_URLL /*파일 절대 경로*/ FROM HD_File WHERE IDXX_NUMB = #{idxx_numb}

SELECT CONCAT(replace(substr(CONVERT(now(), char),3,8),'-',''), 'SMHD',LPAD(ifnull(max(cast(substr(IDXX_NUMB, 13,2)as decimal)),0) + 1,4,'0')) AS IDXX_NUMB FROM HD_Board WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTR(IDXX_NUMB,1,6) = replace(substr(CONVERT(now(), char),3,8),'-','')
SELECT ADMI_MAIL FROM HD_Code WHERE CLAS_CODE = 'CATE_GORY' AND COMM_CODE = #{cate_gory}
